input.sentences: we had dinner at a friend 's house a few weeks ago .
this is her with one of my daughters .
they love visiting each other as often as we can .
one of my daughters drew this picture for her and put it on the table .
we took a few more pictures like this one before going home .
output.sentences: Every holiday my family gets together and carves a turkey.
We took pictures with one relative we had not seen in a while.
We also sat with our good cousins and took more pictures.
The kids had made cute place settings for everyone.
The children had fun at the holiday sitting with the grown ups.
